1370: Gheuardus moved to Verckens merct.A.4 after marriage.
Got married to Heylewigis at age 23 in 1370.
Had a son with Heylewigis, Guido, at age 23.
1373: Had a daughter with Heylewigis, Soeten, at age 26.
1374: Had a daughter with Heylewigis, Geile, at age 27.
1380: Had a daughter with Heylewigis, Folqui, at age 33.
1381: Lost daughter Folqui when Folqui was 2 years old.
1383: Had a son with Heylewigis, Ioris, at age 36.
1386: Had a son with Heylewigis, Geykonis, at age 39.
1389: Had a son with Heylewigis, Jurre, at age 42.
1390: Had a daughter with Heylewigis, Moerseil, at age 43.
1392: Lost daughter Geile when Geile was 18 years old.
1393: Had a daughter with Heylewigis, Itsburgis, at age 46.
1395: Lost daughter Itsburgis when Itsburgis was 3 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
